perturbed_instruction: I click in terminal: terminal->132x43 to set the size, but after each reboot it goes back to default and sometimes changes mid‑session. I can’t use Preferences/dconf or sudo, and I’m not allowed to edit existing lines (append‑only). Autostart/systemd‑user aren’t available, but my user crontab works. Please make 132x43 stick and recover if it resets without overwriting anything.
